Description:
Rustic Charmer on 1 Acre Plus
Close to town, public transport and the local primary school, this characterful log cabin has everything that people move to the Hills for - peace, privacy & SPACE. An opportunity to update - have a google for "log cabins painted black"!
Set on 4400sqm (approx.) and fully fenced, the block is alive with the sound of frogs coming from a large pond at the front entrance. There are many aspects to the garden including walkways, lots of beautiful planting (Victorian Christmas Bush, Weeping Acacias and Fruit Trees) large lawn spaces for the kids to play and a veggie garden.
A mass of wisteria greets you as you enter the large 4 space carport. This is a very serviceable area and includes an air-conditioned office and workshop converted from the double garage.
Step inside and you’ll find a perfectly presented and convenient home with an exceptional country kitchen. Cooking dinner at night is made easy with the size of the kitchen which also includes a built-in corner pantry, enough space for a double fridge, breakfast bar and an Ilve stove top.
There are 2 living areas - one that relates to the kitchen and another at an incredible size of 9x6m that comes with a quality 7' x 3.5' hydrolic pool table, that doubles as a dining table. Originally the space included a 4th bedroom so you could revert it to a 4th bedroom if that suits your growing family’s needs (STCA). Both lounge rooms offer wood fired heating – one is a large open fire and the other an old-school coonara style that can double as an open fire place.
All bedrooms are of good size with BIR’s and the master bedroom includes a “his and hers”.
And finally… after a long day’s work, you’ll enjoy nothing more than coming home to a glass of champagne and relaxing in the spa bath in the large main bathroom.
Call Katie on 0428 744 498 or Georgia on 0488 997 150 for more information.
Insights: 7 Belgrave Avenue, Cockatoo VIC 3781 was last sold in 2018 and 38 other 3 bedroom house in Cockatoo have recently been sold.

Description:
Your Dream 1 Acre Canvas Awaits
Whether you’ve been planning a cute storybook cottage or a modern masterpiece this 1 acre sloping block is the perfect setting (STCA). Located in a tranquil pocket of the community minded, up-and-coming Cockatoo, this is the spot for your grand design.
Easy access to Pakenham or head to Emerald Village for shops and cafe’s.
For research purposes the sale comprises of two 2000m2 titles - 97 & 98 on Plan of Subdivision 011341
Total Area = 4000m2 approx
Total Size = 80m x 50m approx
Authority = Cardinia Shire Council
All services available. All you need is your vision.
Chop chop! Call Katie on 0428 744 498 or Georgia on 0488 997 150 for more info.

Description:
FAMILY LIVING, FLEXIBLE FLOORPLAN
Set in a very private Cockatoo location, on approx. 3062m and at the end on a no through road is this Cedar 4 bedroom plus a study family home. The floorplan is both spacious and functional with two living areas and an additional rumpus room to the rear of the home. There is a light and bright, centrally located kitchen that overlooks a spacious meal area, two bathrooms and an additional ensuite to the master bedroom which is positioned for privacy on an upper level. Special features include ducted heating plus a gas log fire, evaporative cooling and timber flooring. Step outside to a huge outdoor entertainment deck that is big enough for the whole family to enjoy, plus an additional outdoor deck with views across to the Warburton Ranges. The rear yard is fully fenced and there is also a great shed and plenty of car parking for a trade person or larger families needing space. This property would be great for a growing family.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
PROUD TO BE YOUR FAMILY HOME
Located opposite Cockatoo primary school and only minutes’ walk to Cockatoo Main Street with all it has to offer this beautiful brick veneer home is ready to move into, with all the creature comforts and nothing to do but enjoy. The home is bright and welcoming and is set up for any family arrangement, with 3 large bedrooms including master with ensuite, all with built in robes and ceiling fans, 2 separate living areas, one of which opens onto the back deck with views of the completely usable yard and the trees of the Dandenong Ranges beyond. The creature comforts that are not to be overlooked are the 2kw solar system, electric window shutters, ducted heating throughout, 2 split systems, wood heater, dishwasher, freshly painted and brand-new carpet throughout, with all this taking the property to the next level. For all those tradies there is plenty of room to park all the toys, a sealed drive to a generous carport with 2.5 metre clearance, second carport at the rear of the property, single garage and plenty of under house storage, making it ideal for tools and working on your projects. If you love your space or love to entertain this home has you covered from the two large living rooms and spacious kitchen inside to the paved BBQ area, gazebo and lovely established gardens outside, the hardest decision will be whether to invite friends over or enjoy the peace and quiet. Don’t miss this opportunity for you and your family as these homes with all the hidden extras don’t come along every day. Contact Mick Dolphin on 0429 684522, or Dineke Simpson on 0433 658 777 or Steve Dolphin on 0412 996 609 to arrange your inspection now!
consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist
Please note: All property details listed were current at the time of publishing. Due to extreme buyer demand, some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours. Therefore confirmation of all opens with the listing agent within 24 hours of their scheduled opening is advised.

Description:
SWEET STARTER WITH MID-CENTURY STYLE
On a quiet street sits an inviting home that has retained the character of its mid-century heritage. For most, this is a practical home with high ceilings and spacious living areas, whereas for some, it is a true delight to discover period features including wall recesses, wide floorboards, and servery windows from room to room.
With a generous floorplan including 2 living areas with wood fires, a galley kitchen with original cabinetry, and 4 bright and spacious bedrooms, this is a comfortable home with scope to develop to your liking. Added highlights including gas ducted heating, a bright and airy sunroom, and spacious laundry with ample storage, are practical features to be admired.
Outside, this generous and private property offers a myriad of options with 3 garden sheds, a workshop or potential artists' studio, and BBQ area for entertaining.
- Quiet location with easy access to public transport
- Sweet starter home with mid-century flare
- 2 living areas, both with wood fires
- Galley kitchen with servery window to lounge
- High ceilings, floorboards, and floor to ceiling windows
- Bright, generous bedrooms
- 2 garden sheds and workshop or potential artists' studio
- Fenced rear garden with BBQ area

Description:
The Ultimate B&B ‘Cockatoo Cottages’, Picture Perfect On 27 Acres
Set on 27 acres and situated only 56 klm from the CBD, this property offers the perfect mix of natural bush and cleared pasture. The ranch style family home is grand in proportions with high ceilings, polished floor boards, ornate cornices, colonial architraves and has a huge open plan living area that adjoins the timber kitchen which has loads of bench space and stainless steel appliances including dishwasher. The rumpus room is at the opposite end of the home and is ideal as a pool room, theatre room or oversized children’s play room. There are 4 big bedrooms, the master is serviced by a full ensuite, huge WIR and sitting room. The wide shady verandah is a wonderful place to entertain your friends and family or just settle back and enjoy the natural beauty that surrounds. The over height garage provides plenty of options for vehicles and ‘toys’ as does the additional double carport and there is a further machinery/boat storage facility.
THE COTTAGES
‘Cockatoo Cottages’ will provide you with the ability to live the country lifestyle you crave whilst earning a living from the two self-contained cottages that are currently operating as a Bed & Breakfast accommodation with a turnover of approximately $50kplus in its start-up year and showing excellent growth potential.
Both cottages are situated well away from the main house to ensure your privacy, so you can have a home business with minimal impact on your lifestyle. These fully self contained cottages have both been completely refurbished throughout, and all fittings and fixtures are inclusive with the sale. We have our website and are listed with all major sites, and have bookings well into next year.
The cottages offer spa baths in glass bay windows, separate lounge, kitchen and dining area, and are tastefully decorated offering character and charm with high ceilings and a wonderful picturesque outlooks. Kangaroos and native wild life are abundant which is a major draw card.
There is also a separate entrance at the main house, which could be an opportunity to further extend the bed and breakfast to include in-house accommodation.
All of this within easy access to everything that the Yarra Valley has to offer and just moments to the highly regarded Cockatoo Primary School and Emerald Secondary College as well as private school options. A truly unique opportunity for you to pursue your dream of country living whilst generating a great income at the same time.

Description:
Spacious, Immaculate Home on Almost ½ Acre!
What a wonderful opportunity to purchase this beautifully maintained, presented and spacious 3 bedroom home located on almost ½ acre of lovely, private gardens and gently sloping land. The brick veneer home starts with a spacious entry leading to the lounge room with pitched ceiling and floor to ceiling windows that let in an abundance of natural light. You then you have the large dining room and the hostess kitchen with huge 9kW split system which not only cools but heats the home with the help of a heat transfer system. The kitchen has room to move around in, including plenty of pantry space, double wall oven and large breakfast bench. From here you have the laundry, lovely new family bathroom with floor to ceiling tiles and the 3 large bedrooms all with built in robes. The home has typical Hills home features such as the pitched ceilings which have been painted white for that light airy feel and other features include timber floors, ducted vacuum and there are electric shutters on the bedroom windows to keep the home cool on hot summer days. Outside is perfectly set up for entertaining family and friends with an undercover deck, a paved entertaining area as well as an undercover, fully fenced spa for relaxing in year round after a hard day’s work. The garden is also beautifully presented with gently sloping lawns, tree ferns with the best looking stag horns you’ve seen, veggie garden and feature trees. Vehicles are covered with the circular drive, a car space at one end of the home and a single carport with access to the double lock up garage/shed/workshop which will please the man of the house with concrete floor, power, wood heater and TV point so you can watch your sport as you tinker. For cost saving you have 3kW of solar power and though mains water is connected you also have 3 tanks (with pumps) giving you a total of 12,500 litres which is connected to the toilet and laundry. Homes this neat and well maintained are rare – don’t miss the opportunity to inspect this one as it won’t last long!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032
Please note: All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office

Description:
Stunning, Fully Renovated Home!
If you’re looking for a family home where you can walk to the local shops, restaurants and schools, you’re search is over. On offer is this beautifully renovated home with absolutely nothing left to do except walk down to the local café for your morning cappuccino. From the front you have an attractive paling fence, bitumen driveway with enough parking for 6 cars or more, lovely gardens with vegie boxes, chicken coup and wood shed. The home’s country style façade is painted in grey and cream with a welcoming verandah bathed in sunshine. Inside you’ll notice the attention to detail in the finishes and open plan living with the lounge room with ambient wood heater and convenient split system, stunning designer kitchen with stone bench tops, Bosh stainless appliances, clever storage ideas and large breakfast bench facing the dining area. Then you have the three robes bedrooms, the Master with walk in robe and ensuite. Even the laundry has clever use of space with shelving for all your storage needs. Other features include easy care floors, bi fold doors to the front deck, clever retracting fly screens and the Master bedroom has beautiful white timber shutters in the bay window as well as a 2nd split system. The rear garden has had a lot of work put in with tiered retaining walls to create a private haven for entertaining under the beautiful feature trees. Homes in such a convenient location and with everything done for you will appeal to a variety of buyers and this one will not last long. So book your private inspection today to avoid disappointment.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
Circa 1930, Unique Home, Rustic Charm
Tastefully updated & extended is this appealing character north facing home located in a quiet street with feature lead lighting & timberwork throughout & huge back & front yards.
Property features include:
*5 Bedrooms (some with triple & double built in robes), master with ensuite (spa), other bedrooms serviced by the updated main bathroom with red gum timber benchtop
*Lounge, family room & dining area with reverse cycle split system
*Large kitchen with gloss cupboards, dishwasher, new 900mm stainless steel oven plus combustion stove
*Mains services, gas ducted heating, instantaneous hot water, timber floors, water tank,
*Decked front verandah with a view, back verandah, outside 3 room bungalow with concrete floor, chook pen
*Double carport, large under house storage, workshop with power & lighting
*1097m2 (approx.) land plus an extra 200m2 (approx.) of backyard space (reclaimed lane, not on title)
Ideal work from home property.
This property has a lot to offer!

Description:
Great Location, Great Value
Located on a sealed road in an elevated position walking distance to the town centre & primary school is this appealing home with mains services.
Property features include:
*3 bedrooms with built in robes & new carpet all serviced by the main bathroom (semi ensuite)
*Good size kitchen with gas cooking & dishwasher
*Large family/meals area with reverse cycle split system & gas heater
*Fully fenced private yard with side access gate for vehicle access plus another car parking space out the front
*Paved outdoor area, covered front verandah with decking, solar power, window canopies, cottage appeal!
Currently tenanted month to month.
72A is also for sale so buy 1 or buy both, owner occupy or invest, the choice is yours!
Contact Geoff Powell on 0418 102 830.

Description:
All Year Round Entertaining - Moments from Everything in Cockatoo
4 BEDROOMS PLUS STUDY & 7m x 9m SHED on 1/2 ACRE
With a pattern pave driveway you have parking for the masses of guests who will be lining up for their slice from the traditional pizza oven. In winter, fold down the blinds, crank up the wood-fired heater and help yourself from the bar.
Move straight into this cute cedar weatherboard set amongst a mature landscaped garden that includes some stunning feature & flowering fruit trees such as an eastern red bud & late flowering magnolia. Privet hedging & roses along the front verandah complete the picture as you enter this thoroughly well maintained home.
The vaulted ceiling with exposed rafters and LED downlights make for a stunning first impression. The rest of the home does not disappoint. From the country kitchen with free-standing 900mm stainless steel oven to the bedrooms which are generous in size all with BIRs.
If you love the country-style that The Hills are famous for and you want nothing to do but move in and enjoy then this is the home for you.
- Close to transport, Cockatoo Kindergarten, Cockatoo Primary School & the new IGA shopping development
- Off Sealed Road

- 7 x 9 shed – two roller doors front and side pedestrian access – fits 3 cars
- 6 x solar panels 1KW Invertor
- Ducted Heating, Fans & Split System
- BIR’s in all bedrooms & additional storage

Description:
Great Location, Huge Block
Located on a sealed road in an elevated position walking distance to the town centre & primary school is this neat & tidy home with mains services.
Property features include:
*2 bedrooms (double built in robe to master) both serviced by the main bathroom
*Kitchen/family area with timber floors, vaulted ceiling & reverse cycle split system
*Covered front verandah
*Double carport with driveway through to the rear of the property
*1167m2 land (approx.), huge rear yard with views & fruit trees
There is plenty of space here to build your dream home at the back or a huge shed (S.T.C.A.).
If you are interested in this property please call Geoff Powell on 0418 102 830.

Description:
Renovated 4 BDR + Study Home with Gorgeous, Private Outlook!
This lovely renovated home is in a fantastic location within walking distance to Cockatoo shops, schools, medical clinic and public transport. The home sits on a ¼ acre block with gorgeous rear garden with access to the reserve behind giving you the feeling of space and tranquility without having to maintain the space. Featuring 4 robed bedrooms plus study the home caters for family living and with a great undercover entertaining deck with heater and café blinds, it makes entertaining year round a breeze. Recently renovated, the gorgeous new kitchen with more than usual storage including walk in pantry is the perfect place to cook up a storm with the double oven, then cleaning up is a breeze with the double draw dishwasher. Features of the home include mains gas heating, polished floorboards, new family bathroom plus ensuite to the Master bedroom, pitched ceilings, skylights and lead light. For vehicles there’s a sealed drive and double carport with internal access to the home so you’re never caught in the rain with your shopping. The rear garden is a joy with established trees, pretty garden beds and a sweet rotunda at the bottom of the garden with a pond and water feature for that relaxing trickling water sound. Add to this 2 storage sheds and a cubby house for the kids and this family home really ticks all the boxes. With all the hard work done for you this property leaves you nothing to do but move in and enjoy the peaceful lifestyle the Hills provide.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032

Description:
Immaculate Low Maintenance Home on Flat & Private ¼ Acre!
This immaculately maintained and presented home on a quiet no through road leaves you with nothing to do but move in and enjoy the peaceful lifestyle the Hills provide. The home’s low maintenance construction means you will have plenty of time to do the things you enjoy such as tending the established gardens and lawn and out the back you have fruit trees, raspberries and the veggie garden all watered from tank water whilst the home has mains water and mains gas connected. The home features 3 spacious robed bedrooms, the Master with large walk in robe and access to the lovely undercover outdoor area, perfect for sitting in the mornings listening to the birds sing. You then have 2 living areas, the formal living and dining with European wood heater/open fire and the family room which is open plan with the as new chef’s kitchen with European stainless appliances and ample storage including a walk in pantry. Features of this quality home include GDH, a second toilet for convenience and thermal qualities such as the double brick construction, double insulation in the ceiling, electric external shutters, ceiling fans and 1.5 kW of solar power for saving on your energy bills. For entertaining the undercover paved area has a built in BBQ with lovely fern garden aspect, the perfect place to watch the backyard cricket on the open & flat back lawn. For storage there are 2 garden sheds and a double carport and the home is set back off the road so you are assured privacy. This lovely home will appeal to young families and investors alike so be sure to book your private inspection before it’s too late.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032

Description:
SOMETHING FOR EVERYONE ON ½ AN ACRE
This attractive home is situated ½ an acre and is perfect for first home buyers, young families or investors. With raked ceiling in the living area the home is light and bright and has a spacious feel. The central kitchen comes complete with 900mm stainless steel stove and dishwasher and adjoins both living rooms making day-to-day living relaxed and convenient. The rumpus room provides the ideal place to settle back and watch a movie and has a sliding door out to the rear deck which will be the focal point of many happy gatherings. All 3 bedrooms have built in robes and the master is serviced by a full ensuite. A claw foot bath is the centrepiece of the main bathroom and cosy wood heater, ducted heating and evaporative cooling ensure year round comfort. Offering a wide frontage that allows plenty of access for vehicles, the three car garage is perfect for those requiring space for extra storage, room for a workshop or is ideal for a tradesperson with lots of tools. A fully fenced yard means a safe haven for children and pets to play and there is a chicken pen for those looking to be self-sufficient. Close to shops, kindergarten and highly regarded Primary school, this is a property that caters to your every wish.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Character Home in a Quiet Location!
This character home is situated on a ¼ acre block in a quiet location and is perfect for first home buyers or investors, representing great value for money in today’s market. On offer is a weatherboard home with 3 light, bright great sized bedrooms, 2 with built in robes, spacious lounge and dining room with French doors accessing the lovely undercover entertaining area with private garden outlook for relaxing or entertaining family and friends. The warm timber kitchen has ample storage and includes quality stainless dishwasher and gas cooktop, breakfast bench and casual dining area. The family bathroom is timber lined with a bath for relaxing in and separate toilet for convenience, there is also a European Landry so you can just close the doors and forget you even have washing. Features of this lovely home include a stained glass entry door, polished timber floors, timber lining boards, mains gas ducted heating and a split system for cooling. Vehicles are covered with a double carport and the established gardens at the front are lush and in the back yard it’s a cleared blank canvas with a handy storage shed. Well maintained homes such as these and in this price range are in high demand so avoid disappointment and book your private inspection today.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!

Description:
Good Vibes Await on 2057m2
This is a warm and cosy, semi-renovated, two-storey nest for you to put your finishing touches on. Set at the top end of Maurice Street accessed from Paternoster Road and with views to the north. Sold "as is" in a nearly finished condition with some plaster work, electrical & tiling still to be done. The work that is complete is of a really high standard - the kitchen, for example, uses some beautifully crafted wood for the benches and has a large 900mm stove cook top.
Upstairs, an open plan living looks out to greenery from every window including the study nook, with laundry, separate toilet and one bedroom. A spiral staircase takes you down to a second work space, main bathroom and bedroom. My thoughts are that an extension (STCA) might work down the track where the double carport currently is.
The outside spaces and gardens are just magical. A lush fernery with pathways can be enjoyed from the front porch. To the rear a deck leads to the veggie area and shed with a tree house/goat playpen and further garden shed beyond.
This is a very special place to be, so make sure you come and get a feel for it at the open for inspection.
Call Katie on 0428 744 498 for further info.

Description:
Lovely Hills Character Home!
You’re going to love this character, split level hills home in an affordable price range. Well located in a quiet street on a private ½ acre with Cockatoo Creek running through the rear boundary, it’s ready for you to move straight into and enjoy. The weatherboard home has been tastefully updated, painted in greys and white with painted timber panelling throughout keeping its country feel. Featuring 4 bedrooms, 2 with built in robes, the Master with access to the back deck, stunning black and white family bathroom with black claw foot bath, family room with cosy wood heater and meals area. The gorgeous kitchen is the perfect blend of modern and country with white cabinetry, warm timber bench tops and polished stainless appliances. Features include timber flooring, painted timber panelling, split system cooling & quality window furnishings. Outside the established gardens are lush with retaining walls, there’s a cubby house for the kids, a small fenced paddock suitable for a variety of furry or feathered friends, a garden shed for storage and an oversized single garage/workshop with wood heater so you can tinker away in comfort in the cooler months. This appealing home will be popular with first home buyers so check your diary and book your private inspection today.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
Heaven Can Wait!
As you have your very own slice of heaven here. Magnificent heavenly views abound from all aspects of this property, spanning from port Philip Bay to Western Port Bay, Hastings and to the East of Gembrook. The home sits proudly on top of over 2 Acres cleared acres with an electric fenced horse paddock and gorgeous country style gardens. The mud brick home has been skilfully crafted using the mud bricks and rustic timbers creating remarkable character with the space and comfort required for growing families. Created on 2 levels, the home features 4 great sized bedrooms located on the top floor including the Master with craftily hidden ensuite compete with claw foot bath. Also on this level is a living area and the main bathroom comes complete with a laundry chute to make life just that little bit easier. Downstairs you’ll find 3 large and versatile living areas, all with unbelievable views, 2 with access through French Doors to the undercover verandah plus powder room. While the Gas Hydronic Heating snuggly warms the home (& your water) economically, you can either cook up a feast in the French Country Kitchen with quality appliances and pressed metals splash back or relax and cook on the BBQ whilst taking in the magnificent views. For those who work from home there are 2 fantastic options, 1 a 3 roomed multipurpose studio built to high standards plus a single room studio or dedicated workshop, perfect for artists or hobby enthusiasts and both are completely independent of the main house for working uninterrupted. Add to this a lockable hay shed, horse shed and a self-filling water trough fed from tank water, mains water supplies the main house. For storage and vehicles there’s a triple bay garage, storage shed and the secret cellar completes everything you could possibly want or need. Inspect this unique property today and get a taste of what heaven must be like.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Stephen Richards 0400 100 155

Description:
A great place to call home!
Perfectly situated in an elevated setting with loads of natural light and room to move, this much loved family home has character stamped all over it. Set on a 987m2 corner allotment it features dual driveway access to both an oversized, high clearance car/caravan port 11.5m x 6.3m plus a separate garage workshop complete with its own Blacksmiths Forge! The home comprises 3 bedrooms, particularly spacious living areas including lounge, dining and sunroom, country style timber kitchen, outdoor entertainment area and so much more. All services are connected, plus rainwater storage, & PV solar array. Act quickly properties of this calibre simply don't last.
